name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Banana Split - Garmin Connect Pace Calculator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a row to Garmin Connect - Activity - splits view to summarise selected splits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that helps analyze activities on the Garmin Connect web app [https://connect.garmin.com]
Simply choose an activity and click on Splits to view the activity's splits. 
Select different splits to have them averaged in a new summarize interval row below
